channel.title: Codelabs on Alcide | Tutorials & Codelabs
channel.description: Recent content in Codelabs on Alcide | Tutorials & Codelabs

item.title: Alcide Advisor
item.description: In this tutorial we will learn about Alcide Kubernetes Advisor, and how we can implement continous security and cluster hygiene for one or more Kubernetes clusters. Start Codelab Star

item.title: Alcide Advisor | Azure DevOps
item.description: In this tutorial we will learn about Alcide Kubernetes Advisor, and how we can implement continous security and cluster hygiene for one or more Kubernetes clusters in a Azure DevOps pipeline. Start Codelab

item.title: Alcide Advisor | Jenkins
item.description: In this tutorial we will learn about Alcide Kubernetes Advisor, and how we can implement continous security and cluster hygiene for one or more Kubernetes clusters in a Jenkins CI+CD pipeline. Start Codelab Star
